title: VERABENDI Women's Off Shoulder Summer Casual Long Ruffle Beach Maxi Dress with Pockets
description: 【Fashion Design】: This Maxi Dresses for Women has Lovely Ruffles. The Slits on the Sides Make for a Comfortable Breezy Feel in a Warm Day.
【Delicate Design】: Framed by Delicate Pleated Details Adds an Extra Layer of Dimension to this Already Eye-catching Maternity Dress.
【Wear Style】: This Long Dress Stays as Off the Shoulder or You Can Wear this Maxi Dress as a Strapless / Tube Dress.
【Clothes Match】: Can be Used as a Beach Dress or Maternity Dress for Photoshoot. Dress it up with Matching Beach Sandals, Sunglasses and Welcome a Day of Sunshine!
【Occasion】: This Off Shoulder Dress Suitable for Causal Wear / Holiday / Beach / Dating / Evening / Going Out / Party / Baby Shower / Summer Wedding / Maternity Pictures / Engagement Pictures
